concept.title: Installing the HTTP Module for Tomcat
concept.shortdesc: This topic describes how to install the HTTP session management module for Tomcat.

ol.li: If you do not already have Tomcat installed, download the desired version from the Apache Website.

li.p: The HTTP Session Management Module for Tomcat is included in the Pivotal installation package. After you install , you will find the module in the tools/Modules directory of the installation.

ol.li: Unzip the module into the $CATALINA_HOME directory or wherever you installed the application server.

Copy the following jar files to the lib directory of your Tomcat server ($CATALINA_HOME/lib):
antlr jar
fastutil jar
geode-core jar
javax.transaction-api jar
jgroups jar
log4j-api jar
log4j-core jar
log4j-jul jar
